readable.title: 3687996569_99163a41c3
readable.content: Colorfully dressed people walk down the center of the road , with onlookers behind a barricade . People are dressed in purple , blue , green , yellow , orange and red costumes for a parade . Six people in bright mono-color costumes , each a different color , are walking down a street . Six people walking in a parade wearing brightly colored outfits . Six women dressed in purple , blue , green , orange , and red , are waving to the crowd along the parade route .
